title: Are You Listening?
itunes:title: Are You Listening?
description:
Proverbs 3:6 says, “Listen to God’s voice in everything you do and everywhere you go. He will keep you on the best path.” In this message, Joel will teach you practical ways to listen to God’s voice and how to recognize His leading in your everyday life.----Visit https://joelosteen.com to receive daily updates and encouragement from Joel Osteen.----Have you followed Joel Osteen on Instagram? https://instagram.com/joelosteen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
